sentences.sContent: Pablo Picasso played a principal role in the early movement of cubism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pablo Picasso played a principal role in the early movement of cubism.
sentences.sCn: 帕勃洛•毕加索在立体派早期发展中起首重要的推动作用。

words.tran: 立体派艺术家；立体派画家
使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积

trans.tranOther: a 20th-century style of art, in which objects and people are represented by  geometric  shapes
